body:
Comment 8: 
I think the way this is supposed to work is that when the linker is running in external
mode it explicitly imports runtime/cgo.  I think the idea is that that will set
_cgo_init and thus avoid this problem.  This is not working, in the sense that _cgo_init
is not being set.  If that is correct then the fact that this works when not using
-extldflags -static is a coincidence.
